description: This file implements a MCP-based GitHub agent that interacts with GitHub repositories to explore, analyze, and provide insights. It sets up an asynchronous agent that uses MCP tools to respond to user prompts about issues, pull requests, and repository details.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an autonomous agent that can perform tasks using provided tools.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A class providing MCP protocol tools for interacting with GitHub via MCP server.

classes.name: StdioServerParameters
classes.description: A class encapsulating parameters for starting an MCP server process.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs the MCP GitHub agent with a specified message prompt.
